caption.p: Analysis of 16 hub genes and module gene expression levels in NFPA recurrence at ≥5 years (red boxes) or ≤1 year (blue boxes), including (A) CCR1, (B) CCL3, (C) CCL4, (D) PACSIN1, (E) CGNL1, (F) TRIM69, (G) STAB2, (H) ATP8A1, (I) CD48, (J) NOL6, (K) ZFP36, (L) KLF4, (M) CD247, (N) CTD-2515H24.2, (O) LL21NC02-21A1.1 and (P) LOC200772. FC, fold-change; NFPA, non-functioning pituitary adenoma.
